name: Master of Boxes
description:
This game was made in about 72 hours by almost only me for Optical Jam #3

You play as an anthropomorphic box that must solve (a very small number of) puzzles by moving boxes in the four cardinal directions, you have to move them onto buttons to open the door that ends the level.

I unfortunately didn't have a lot of time to focus on this project. Life, and the fact that I can't design good puzzles really hampered that :/

But I hope you enjoy it for what it's worth, and I might come back to it at some point, but I kind of want to get onto making something else, we'll see :D

Everything except music==============

Jacen Wyatt (HappySlapp)

Music loop============================

Arachnibot (Thanks dude :D)
